content: TITLE: Initializing OpenSheetMusicDisplay with Options in JavaScript DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to create an OpenSheetMusicDisplay instance with custom options, allowing control over rendering aspects like compact mode and display of musical elements. SOURCE: https://github.com/opensheetmusicdisplay/opensheetmusicdisplay/blob/develop/CHANGELOG_old.md#2025-04-22_snippet_15 LANGUAGE: JavaScript CODE: ``` new OpenSheetMusicDisplay(container, { drawPartNames: true, drawTitle: true, drawSubtitle: false, drawComposer: true, drawLyricist: false, compactMode: true }); ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Drawing Overlay Lines in OSMD DESCRIPTION: This feature allows rendering colored lines on any MusicPage using the Drawer.DrawOverlayLine method, providing a way to add custom visual elements to the score. SOURCE: https://github.com/opensheetmusicdisplay/opensheetmusicdisplay/blob/develop/CHANGELOG_old.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` osmd.Drawer.DrawOverlayLine ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Accessing Graphical Notes Under Cursor in JavaScript DESCRIPTION: New function added to get GraphicalNotes under the cursor position. This allows retrieving rendered note objects at the current cursor location. SOURCE: https://github.com/opensheetmusicdisplay/opensheetmusicdisplay/blob/develop/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-22_snippet_9 LANGUAGE: JavaScript CODE: ``` GNotesUnderCursor() ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting Up Multiple Cursors DESCRIPTION: Code to create and manage multiple cursors in OpenSheetMusicDisplay, including disposal and configuration options SOURCE: https://github.com/opensheetmusicdisplay/opensheetmusicdisplay/blob/develop/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: JavaScript CODE: ``` osmd.cursor.Dispose(); // Remove existing cursor cursor.CursorOptions.color = '#FF0000'; // Set cursor color cursor.update(); // Update cursor display ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Opening Same-Origin XML URL in OpenSheetMusicDisplay (JavaScript) DESCRIPTION: Adds support for opening same-origin XML URLs in OpenSheetMusicDisplay. SOURCE: https://github.com/opensheetmusicdisplay/opensheetmusicdisplay/blob/develop/CHANGELOG_old.md#2025-04-22_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: JavaScript CODE: ``` // open same-origin xml url: supported ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Measure Numbers in OpenSheetMusicDisplay (JavaScript) DESCRIPTION: Adds options to disable measure numbers or set their interval in OpenSheetMusicDisplay. SOURCE: https://github.com/opensheetmusicdisplay/opensheetmusicdisplay/blob/develop/CHANGELOG_old.md#2025-04-22_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: JavaScript CODE: ``` // offer options to disable measure numbers, set their interval ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Specifying First and Last Measures to Draw in OpenSheetMusicDisplay (JavaScript) DESCRIPTION: Allows specifying both the first and last measures to draw from in OpenSheetMusicDisplay. SOURCE: https://github.com/opensheetmusicdisplay/opensheetmusicdisplay/blob/develop/CHANGELOG_old.md#2025-04-22_snippet_9 LANGUAGE: JavaScript CODE: ``` // drawFromMeasureNumber: can now specify first measure to draw from as well as last ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting OpenSheetMusicDisplay Rule in JavaScript DESCRIPTION: Example of setting an OpenSheetMusicDisplay rendering rule. This rule controls whether fingering position is read from XML or set automatically. SOURCE: https://github.com/opensheetmusicdisplay/opensheetmusicdisplay/blob/develop/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-22_snippet_10 LANGUAGE: JavaScript CODE: ``` osmd.rules.FingeringPositionFromXML = false; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Updating GraphicalSheet in OpenSheetMusicDisplay API (JavaScript) DESCRIPTION: Allows updating the graphical sheet from the music sheet in the OpenSheetMusicDisplay API. SOURCE: https://github.com/opensheetmusicdisplay/opensheetmusicdisplay/blob/develop/CHANGELOG_old.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: JavaScript CODE: ``` // Allow updating the graphical sheet from the music sheet ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Saving ActiveTimeSignature in OpenSheetMusicDisplay (JavaScript) DESCRIPTION: Saves the ActiveTimeSignature in the SourceMeasure object in OpenSheetMusicDisplay. SOURCE: https://github.com/opensheetmusicdisplay/opensheetmusicdisplay/blob/develop/CHANGELOG_old.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: JavaScript CODE: ``` // save ActiveTimeSignature in SourceMeasure ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Saving BPM for Measures in OpenSheetMusicDisplay (JavaScript) DESCRIPTION: Adds functionality to save the BPM (beats per minute) for measures in OpenSheetMusicDisplay. SOURCE: https://github.com/opensheetmusicdisplay/opensheetmusicdisplay/blob/develop/CHANGELOG_old.md#2025-04-22_snippet_10 LANGUAGE: JavaScript CODE: ``` // Save measures' BPM ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Displaying XML Part Abbreviations in OpenSheetMusicDisplay (JavaScript) DESCRIPTION: Adds functionality to read and display XML part abbreviations (e.g. Vln for Violin) in OpenSheetMusicDisplay. SOURCE: https://github.com/opensheetmusicdisplay/opensheetmusicdisplay/blob/develop/CHANGELOG_old.md#2025-04-22_snippet_13 LANGUAGE: JavaScript CODE: ``` // read and display XML part abbreviations (e.g. Vln for Violin) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Displaying Single Note Tremolos in OpenSheetMusicDisplay (JavaScript) DESCRIPTION: Adds support for displaying single note tremolos in OpenSheetMusicDisplay. SOURCE: https://github.com/opensheetmusicdisplay/opensheetmusicdisplay/blob/develop/CHANGELOG_old.md#2025-04-22_snippet_14 LANGUAGE: JavaScript CODE: ``` // display single note tremolos ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Accessing Note Pitch in Short String Format DESCRIPTION: Code example demonstrating how to use the ToStringShort or ToStringShortGet methods to obtain a concise string representation of a note's pitch, such as "F#4". SOURCE: https://github.com/opensheetmusicdisplay/opensheetmusicdisplay/blob/develop/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: JavaScript CODE: ``` gNote.sourceNote.Pitch?.ToStringShortGet ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting Page Background Color in OSMD DESCRIPTION: The pageBackgroundColor option allows changing the canvas color from transparent to a specific color like white, useful for PDF export and display purposes. SOURCE: https://github.com/opensheetmusicdisplay/opensheetmusicdisplay/blob/develop/CHANGELOG_old.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` pageBackgroundColor ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Rendering Single Horizontal Staffline Option DESCRIPTION: The renderSingleHorizontalStaffline option allows controlling how stafflines are displayed, particularly useful for special notation cases. SOURCE: https://github.com/opensheetmusicdisplay/opensheetmusicdisplay/blob/develop/CHANGELOG_old.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` renderSingleHorizontalStaffline ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting Empty Measure Rendering Option DESCRIPTION: The fillEmptyMeasuresWithWholeRest option controls whether empty measures in a score should be filled with whole rests or left empty. SOURCE: https://github.com/opensheetmusicdisplay/opensheetmusicdisplay/blob/develop/CHANGELOG_old.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` fillEmptyMeasuresWithWholeRest ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting Fixed Measure Width DESCRIPTION: Shows usage of new fixed measure width options SOURCE: https://github.com/opensheetmusicdisplay/opensheetmusicdisplay/blob/develop/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-22_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` EngravingRules.FixedMeasureWidth EngravingRules.FixedMeasureWidthFixedValue ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: MusicXML Width Factor Configuration DESCRIPTION: XML attribute configuration for controlling measure widths in the score SOURCE: https://github.com/opensheetmusicdisplay/opensheetmusicdisplay/blob/develop/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: XML CODE: ``` score-partwise.osmdMeasureWidthFactor="value" osmdWidthFactor="value" ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting Font Family for Labels in OpenSheetMusicDisplay (JavaScript) DESCRIPTION: Allows setting the font family for labels in OpenSheetMusicDisplay, with Times New Roman as the default. SOURCE: https://github.com/opensheetmusicdisplay/opensheetmusicdisplay/blob/develop/CHANGELOG_old.md#2025-04-22_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: JavaScript CODE: ``` // can set font family for labels (default Times New Roman) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting System Break Option DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates usage of newSystemFromNewPageInXML option SOURCE: https://github.com/opensheetmusicdisplay/opensheetmusicdisplay/blob/develop/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-22_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` newSystemFromNewPageInXML = true ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Handling Invisible Notes in OpenSheetMusicDisplay (JavaScript) DESCRIPTION: Adds invisible notes as transparent StaveNotes instead of GhostNotes in OpenSheetMusicDisplay. SOURCE: https://github.com/opensheetmusicdisplay/opensheetmusicdisplay/blob/develop/CHANGELOG_old.md#2025-04-22_snippet_11 LANGUAGE: JavaScript CODE: ``` // add invisible notes as transparent StaveNotes instead of GhostNotes ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Implementing DrawCredits Option in OpenSheetMusicDisplay (JavaScript) DESCRIPTION: Implements the DrawCredits option in OpenSheetMusicDisplay. SOURCE: https://github.com/opensheetmusicdisplay/opensheetmusicdisplay/blob/develop/CHANGELOG_old.md#2025-04-22_snippet_12 LANGUAGE: JavaScript CODE: ``` // implement DrawCredits ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Implementing RenderCopyright Option DESCRIPTION: Code snippet showing usage of new copyright rendering option in OSMD SOURCE: https://github.com/opensheetmusicdisplay/opensheetmusicdisplay/blob/develop/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` osmd.EngravingRules.RenderCopyright = true ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting Legacy Subtitle and Composer Parsing DESCRIPTION: Code snippet showing how to restore the old subtitle and composer parsing behavior from OSMD version 1.8.5 or earlier. This option is deprecated and might be removed in future versions. SOURCE: https://github.com/opensheetmusicdisplay/opensheetmusicdisplay/blob/develop/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: JavaScript CODE: ``` osmd.EngravingRules.SheetComposerSubtitleUseLegacyParsing = true ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Changelog Markdown for Version Updates DESCRIPTION: Markdown formatted changelog entries detailing bug fixes and features added in versions 1.9.0 and 1.8.9 of OpenSheetMusicDisplay. SOURCE: https://github.com/opensheetmusicdisplay/opensheetmusicdisplay/blob/develop/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` # [1.9.0](https://github.com/opensheetmusicdisplay/opensheetmusicdisplay/compare/1.8.9...1.9.0) (2025-03-20) ### Bug Fixes * **AlignRests:** Fix rare null error in Vexflow when AlignRests option used on rest ghost notes ([747f3db]) * **Breath Mark:** Fix breath mark to the left instead of right of last note in measure in rare cases ([#1548]) [...additional entries omitted for brevity...] ### Features * **Articulation / Layout:** Add option to place accents (>) and other articulations above note even if stem is up ([849c719]) [...additional entries omitted for brevity...] ## [1.8.9](https://github.com/opensheetmusicdisplay/opensheetmusicdisplay/compare/1.8.8...1.8.9) (2024-07-15) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Correcting Property Name Typo DESCRIPTION: Fixes typo in EngravingRules property name from 'Muti' to 'Multi' SOURCE: https://github.com/opensheetmusicdisplay/opensheetmusicdisplay/blob/develop/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-22_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` EngravingRules.AutoGenerateMultipleRestMeasuresFromRestMeasures ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Basic HTML Logo and Header Structure for OSMD README DESCRIPTION: HTML markup for displaying the OSMD logo alongside the project title at the top of the README file. The code contains multiple commented-out alternative header implementations. SOURCE: https://github.com/opensheetmusicdisplay/opensheetmusicdisplay/blob/develop/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ``` # OpenSheetMusicDisplay (OSMD) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Alternative HTML Table Layout for README Header DESCRIPTION: Commented-out HTML table structure that provides an alternative way to display the OSMD logo and title. This implementation uses a fixed-width table with center alignment for the header. SOURCE: https://github.com/opensheetmusicdisplay/opensheetmusicdisplay/blob/develop/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ``` ```
